query.sql:
WITH t_1044_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 1044 AND c2.status_id IN (206, 207, 34145)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_702335') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_504_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 504 AND c2.status_id IN (477679, 477681, 104, 103, 34145)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_RASSM_PERSON') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_524_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 524 AND c2.status_id IN (67425)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_FOR_INFORMATION') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_365_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 365 AND c2.status_id IN (204, 477934, 205, 1)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_SIGN_RESPONSIBLE') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_348_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 348 AND c2.status_id IN (201, 6092498, 202, 1)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_VISA_RESPONSIBLE') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_2344_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 2344 AND c2.status_id IN (201, 34145)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_VISA_RESPONSIBLE') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_1255_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 1255 AND c2.status_id IN (505050,103,206)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_INFD_SGNEX_LINK') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_764_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 764 AND c2.status_id IN (101,103,206,104,48909)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_HIDDEN_CHIEF') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_1226_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 1226 AND c2.status_id IN (101,103,206,104,48909)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_HIDDEN_CHIEF') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_324_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 324 AND c2.status_id IN (103,206,34145)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('JBR_RESP_DOW_MAINDOC') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), t_1144_docs AS ( SELECT c2.card_id FROM attribute_value av_executor JOIN card c2 ON (c2.card_id = av_executor.card_id AND c2.template_id = 1144 AND c2.status_id IN (67425)) WHERE av_executor.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_726874') AND av_executor.number_value = %CURRENTUSERS% ), cards_temp_table AS ( --add template 1044 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_702604') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1044_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_702604') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_702604') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1044_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 504 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_RASSM_PARENT_DOC') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_504_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_RASSM_PARENT_DOC') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_RASSM_PARENT_DOC') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_504_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 524 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_INFORM_DOC') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_524_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_INFORM_DOC') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_INFORM_DOC') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_524_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 365 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_SIGN_PARENT') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_365_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_SIGN_PARENT') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_SIGN_PARENT') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_365_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 348 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_VISA_PARENT_DOC') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_348_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_VISA_PARENT_DOC') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_VISA_PARENT_DOC') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_348_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 2344 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_ADO_DOCBASE') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_2344_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_ADO_DOCBASE') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_ADO_DOCBASE') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_2344_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 1255 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1255_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1255_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 764 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_764_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_764_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 1226 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1226_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_DOCL_RELATDOC','ADMIN_221237') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1226_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 324 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_MAINDOC') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_324_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('JBR_MAINDOC') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('JBR_MAINDOC') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_324_docs AS tt)
UNION --add template 1144 SELECT DISTINCT av_basecard.number_value FROM attribute_value av_basecard INNER JOIN attribute a ON (a.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_726877') AND a.data_type <> 'B') WHERE av_basecard.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1144_docs AS tt) AND av_basecard.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_726877') UNION SELECT functionbacklink(ccc.card_id, o1.option_value, o2.option_value) AS number_value FROM card ccc INNER JOIN template_block tb ON tb.template_id = ccc.template_id INNER JOIN attribute a ON a.block_code=tb.block_code AND a.data_type='B' AND a.attribute_code IN ('ADMIN_726877') LEFT JOIN attribute_option o1 ON a.attribute_code = o1.attribute_code AND o1.option_code = 'UPLINK' LEFT JOIN attribute_option o2 ON a.attribute_code = o2.attribute_code AND o2.option_code = 'LINK' WHERE ccc.card_id IN (SELECT tt.card_id FROM t_1144_docs AS tt) ), c as ( select c.CARD_ID, c.TEMPLATE_ID, c.STATUS_ID, t.template_name_rus from cards_temp_table inner join card c ON (c.card_id = cards_temp_table.number_value) inner join template t on (t.template_id=c.template_id) where exists (select 1 from ATTRIBUTE_VALUE av where av.ATTRIBUTE_CODE = 'CREATED' and av.date_VALUE > date_trunc('day', now() - INTERVAL '30 days') and av.CARD_ID = c.CARD_ID))
select c.card_id from c
